categories: Category:Personnel of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Kassek-Ka was a male Codru-Ji clan leader. In 137 ABY, Darth Kruhl persuaded him to stop resisting the Empire and convince other clan leaders of doing so by killing his rival, Rikkar-Du. Kassek-Ka personally killed Rikkar-Du's wife, Tassa.

Kassek-Ka first appeared in Legacy 13, which remains the character's only in-universe appearance to date. Although the comic, predictably, never specifies whether the letter k in the second part of Kassek-Ka's name is capitalized, it is written as uppercase in the 2008 reference book The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, in which the character is mentioned in Tassa's entry.
